nodes.text: The Mandalorian: A Clan of Two

The Mandalorian: A Clan of Two is a storybook for young readers by Brooke Vitale that adapts events of the first season of the The Mandalorian television series. It was published on December 1, 2020 by Disney–Lucasfilm Press.
A storybook that re-tells the highlights of the first season of the smash-hit Disney+ live action television series, Star Wars: The Mandalorian.
The book erroneously states that when Greef Karga was wounded during the events of "Chapter 7: The Reckoning", it was by The Client's soldiers, not Nevarro reptavians.
